ing: 1 cup brewed black tea (such as Gold PeakÂ®), chilled
1 banana, broken into chunks and frozen
3 fresh mint leaves, or more to taste
des: "Summer's best berries meet up with banana, pineapple, mint, and black tea in this light and colorful smoothie. A splash of lemon juice adds just the right brightness to the mix."
ins: Combine tea, berries, pineapple, banana, lemon juice, mint, and honey in a blender. Blend until smooth.
